channel.title: Cant walk while on client
channel.description: Well my client works for everyone else that gets on the server and they have no problem, but when my friend gets on and he tries to walk to attack something it disconnects him. He can follow people, change armour, weapons, and can talk but he just cant walk or attack anything. Can someone please tell me what is wrong? Im pretty sure it has something to do with his computer since the client works for 40+ people

item.title: Cant walk while on client
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

alrighty ill see if he can get it

Read full topic

item.title: Cant walk while on client
item.dc:creator: @Mowiez Mowiez
item.description:
@Mowiez wrote:

As soon as the error comes, use the print screen button and paste it into paint and you should be able to read it.

Read full topic
